home.title: Final Cards
home.createOrEditLabel: Create or edit a Final Card

finalCard.created: A new Final Card is created with identifier {{ param }}
finalCard.updated: A Final Card is updated with identifier {{ param }}
finalCard.deleted: A Final Card is deleted with identifier {{ param }}

delete.question: Are you sure you want to delete Final Card {{ id }}?

finalCard.title: Title

help.title: 标题
help.details: 优惠说明（兑换券的兑换内容也是写在这里）
help.canUseWithOtherCard: 能否与其他卡券同时使用
help.acceptCategories: 适用的菜品分类。分类编号之间由逗号分隔，值为空时表示不限定分类
help.acceptShops: 适用的门店。门店编号之间由逗号分隔，值为空时表示不限定门店
help.leastCost: 起用金额，单位为分。如果无起用门槛则填0
help.reduceCost: 减免金额，单位为分（代金券专用）
help.discount: 打折额度（百分比，例如：30就是七折）（折扣券专用）
help.gift: 兑换的菜品（兑换券专用）
help.giftQuantity: 兑换菜品数量（兑换券专用）
help.status: 卡券状态。这里只可能取 DISCONTINUE 和 EXPIRED 两种值
